content.text: Match ends, Everton 0, Burnley 1.
Second Half ends, Everton 0, Burnley 1.
Attempt missed. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Leighton Baines with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Cuco Martina (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ashley Barnes (Burnley).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Matthew Lowton.
Attempt blocked. Ashley Williams (Everton) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dominic Calvert-Lewin with a headed pass.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Stephen Ward (Burnley) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wayne Rooney (Everton).
Substitution, Burnley. Ashley Barnes replaces Jeff Hendrick.
Foul by Michael Keane (Everton).
Chris Wood (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Hand ball by Ashley Williams (Everton).

Robbie Brady (Burnley) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
